title: Children's Halloween punch with eyeballs and worms
ingredients: ['1 (425g) tin lychees in light syrup, drained', '200g glace cherries', 'toothpicks', '2L cloudy apple juice', '1L orange juice', '5 drops blue food colouring', '1 (300g) tin mandarins in juice, drained', '1L sparkling water', '100g gummy worms']
